齳齳齳

齳字的基本解释

齳
yǔn
老人无牙的样子：“齳然落未已，一往将何如？”

齳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔn］
［《廣韻》魚吻切，上吻，疑。］
亦作“齫1”。
无齿。

齳字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齳； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1535第09
【唐韻】魚吻切【集韻】牛吻切，?音喗。【說文】無齒也。【韓詩外傳】太公年七十二，齳然而齒墜矣。　又【集韻】苦本切，音捆。齒見貌。一曰齧也。或作齦。

齳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
齳字的起名意思

暂无。

齳
Basic explanation of words
齳
yǔn
The old man's toothless look: "It's still gone, what will happen in the future?"
齳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǔn］
["Guangyun" fish kiss cut, upper kiss, suspicious. ]
Also known as "齫1".
No teeth.
齳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Tooth Word Department] 　齳; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1535 Page 09
[Tang Yun] Fish kiss cut [Jiyun] Cow kiss cut,? The sound. [Said the text] There is no tooth. [Han Shiwai Biography] In the seventy-two year of Taigong, his teeth fell sharply.　[Jiyun] The hard roots are cut, the sound is bound. See the appearance. One said bite too. Or as gums.
齳
